snippet: The newspaper, based in London, said it would publish only one print edition and devote its resources to creating content for the Web and other digital platforms.
abstract: Financial Times plans to stop printing regional editions and produce only single global daily newspaper; will devote its resources to creating content for the Web and other digital platforms.
lead_paragraph: The newspaper, based in London, said it would publish only one print edition and devote its resources to creating content for the Web and other digital platforms.

headline.main: Financial Times to Consolidate Print Editions
headline.print_headline: Financial Times Will Consolidate Its Print Editions
